nodes.text: Lyrax Pentigure was a debate show host working for the HoloNet News program A Galaxy Divided during the Clone Wars.

In 21 BBY, he hosted a panel discussion on the Confederacy of Independent Systems' mysterious new weapon. His guests were Nasdra Magrody representing the Magrody Institute of Programmable Intelligence, Umak Leth representing the Ministry of Science, and Bunt Dantor representing the Techno Union Research and Development Wing. The program was interrupted mid-discussion to present a live press conference hosted by representatives of the Republic Navy.
